options.A: A. A type of supervised learning algorithm.
options.B: B. A type of unsupervised learning algorithm.
options.C: C. A type of reinforcement learning algorithm.
options.D: D. A type of semi-supervised learning algorithm.

question: 2. What does the ID3 algorithm do at each step?

options.D: D. Picks the attribute with the most missing values.

question: 3. How does the ID3 algorithm determine the best attribute?

options.A: A. By calculating the information gain.
options.D: D. By calculating the standard deviation.

question: 5. How does the ID3 algorithm determine the entropy of a set?

options.A: A. By counting the number of instances in the set.
options.B: B. By calculating the average of the labels in the set.
options.C: C. By calculating the standard deviation of the labels in the set.
options.D: D. By calculating the probability of each label in the set.
